EmailTemplate.name: StaplesProspecting
EmailTemplate.subject: Here is your digital marketing audit from Staples and G/O Digital
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your free online report from Staples and GannettLocal
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
My name is {!Lead.OwnerFullName}, and I work for G/O Digital. Attached is your free digital marketing audit that tracks your performance for over 20 digital marketing categories and evaluates your competition.
The audit is pretty in-depth, and I would like to know if you will be available to schedule a phone call to go over the results with you. Please let me know your availability, or you can contact me at any time from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. MST. My direct phone number is: 866.618.6630
You can also learn more about our current advertising packages to grow your business, take a look at these available cost-effective solutions.
Thank you again for your interest,
{!Lead.Lead_Owner__c} p: 866.618.6630 e: {!Lead.Owner_Email__c}
